title: How come this year (2012) the only community Christmas decorations in the large, upscale Leland neighborhood of Brunswick Forest are a few nondescript white lights?  In years past, the neighborhood has been nicely decorated for the holidays.  This question is in regard to the community decorations, not decorations at individual homes.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17155
